featured.text: Nowadays, on April Fools’ Day, people often 19 to create elaborate hoaxes to fool others.

definition.zh_def: 一種故意誤導他人的欺騙行為或謊言。
definition.en_def: A deliberate deception intended to trick or mislead others.
definition.example: The news about the alien invasion turned out to be a hoax.
